  1. Components
  2. Buttons

Coloured Button Complete

The coloured button is for buttons that should be emphasized on a page. Various colours are supported including: orange, blue, purple, green, yellow, dark-purple, teal, sky-blue, pink, pink2, violet, bluegreen, deepred, muteorange, deeppurple, richpink, and more!

  • Coloured Button
Coloured Button custom-block <colour>

A coloured button used for emphasized linkages

    • HTML

Usage

Class Name Description
custom-block

This required style identifies an <a> tag as a coloured block
<colour>

A required colour class for your block. Supported colours include: orange, blue, purple, green, yellow, dark-purple, teal, sky-blue, pink, pink2, violet, bluegreen, deepred, muteorange, deeppurple, richpink, and more

Fine print

  • Version: 0.3
  • Last Updated: May 13, 2021
